meta.title: AI Zi Wei Dou Shu - Modern Chinese Astrology System | Combining Traditional Zhongzhou School with AI
meta.description: AI Zi Wei Dou Shu - Enter your birth date and time, select your gender to get your free destiny chart. Combining traditional Zhongzhou school theory with modern AI technology, providing accurate destiny analysis, 12 palace calculations, 14 major star configurations, Four Transformations analysis, and AI-powered interactive Q&A.
